1111110111011110 1100010000010101 1 -> sum: 1100000111110100, cout: 1
0011011000010101 0110001001100110 0 -> sum: 1001100001111011, cout: 0
0110010100010111 0000001111010001 1 -> sum: 0110100011101001, cout: 0
1010000101100101 1001111000101101 1 -> sum: 0011111110010011, cout: 1
1011111000110100 1101011001110101 1 -> sum: 1001010010101010, cout: 1
1010100100110111 0001010010000111 1 -> sum: 1011110110111111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1

0000000000000001 0000000000000010 0 -> sum: 0000000000000011, cout: 0
